title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions: Indulge your senses with our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle Set! This set of 16 scented candles is the perfect gift for the special women in your life - whether it's your mother, wife, daughter, or friend. Each candle is made with natural soy wax and infused with essential oils, providing a clean and long-lasting burn time of 18-20 hours. The tin can containers are not only recyclable but can also be repurposed as flowerpots or home decorations. With an array of delightful fragrances such as Jasmine, Rose, Vanilla, and more, this set is sure to bring joy and relaxation to any space. Treat your loved ones (or yourself) to a little luxury with our Aromatherapy Candle Set today!
